Package org.openadaptor.core.lifecycle

framework lifecyle interfaces, base implementations and helper classes

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ILifecycleComponent Represents a component that has State and that must be validated, started and stopped.
ILifecycleComponentContainer Represents a object that has knowledge of some ILifecycleComponents.
ILifecycleComponentManager Represents a class which will manage ILifecycleComponents.
ILifecycleListener Callback interface for classes that are interested in lifecycle state changes.
IRunnable Represents classes that "create" new data and process it by delegating to an IMessageProcessor.
 

Class Summary
LifecycleComponent Base implementation of the ILifecycleComponent interface.
LifecycleDelegate Thread safe class that can be used by classes wishing to implement the ILifecycleComponent interface.
State Enumeration for state.
 

Package org.openadaptor.core.lifecycle Description

framework lifecyle interfaces, base implementations and helper classes
